name: comprehension
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the ability to understand completely and be familiar with a situation, facts, etc.: He has no comprehension of the size of the problem. How she manages to fit so much into a working day is beyond my comprehension (= I cannot understand it).
[ C or U ] UK a test to find out how well students understand written or spoken language: a listening/reading comprehension
